title: My Weather
details:
• Display weather in different cities.
• Provides location, weather, humidity, wind, pressure, and a 5-day weather forecast.
• Responsive on different devices.
• Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
• Weather API: https://openweathermap.org/api
• Location API: https://openweathermap.org/api/geocoding-api

title: My Quiz App
details: A quiz application that allows users to take quizzes in multiple categories. Built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, and integrated with the Open Quiz API to fetch dynamic questions.

title: Feedback
details: A React web application for collecting user feedback and service ratings. It uses JSON Server as a mock backend to store and retrieve feedback data.

title: Workout G.E.M.
details: An Android application designed to support users in their fitness journey by tracking workouts, offering activity insights, and setting fitness goals.

title: Smart Food
details: An iOS mobile app to manage food in the fridge. Users can view, add, edit, and delete food items and enable/disable expiry notifications. The app helps reduce food waste by keeping track of expiration dates.
